Elements.Name: IsAirBoostRollCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform an air boost whilst rolling in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsQuickStepRollCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform a quick step whilst rolling.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsStompRollCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform a stomp attack whilst rolling in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsUncurlWhenUngrounded
Description: Automatically cancels rolling when Sonic becomes ungrounded, allowing him to perform tricks.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsNoFansWhenRolling
Description:
Allows you to roll uninterrupted through fans without flying upwards. This is particularly useful for Air Dash.
Fans will be completely operational for all other cases except for rolling.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSideViewRollFix
Description: Fixes the drop dash getting stuck in 2D areas if you move the analog stick towards or away from the camera plane.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsGrindDoubleJumpFix
Description: Allows you to drop dash immediately after jumping off a grind rail, rather than waiting for the separate grind double jump state to exit first.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSlideDash
Description: Instantly drop dash on the ground by sliding.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsAirDash
Description:
Uses the new Air Dash that lets you drop dash in the air by boosting whilst charging a drop dash.
Input Guide;
- Default: A + A + A (Hold) + RT
- Drop Dash on Double Jump: A + A (Hold) + RT
Default: False

Elements.Name: AirDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Both

Elements.Name: AirDashUncurlType
Description: The behaviour of the drop dash rolling when initiating it from the Air Dash.
Default: None

Elements.Name: AirDashInitialVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of the Air Dash in 3D areas.
Default: 30.0

Elements.Name: AirDashInitialVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of the Air Dash in 2D areas.
Default: 15.0

Elements.Name: IsStompDash
Description: Uses the new Stomp Dash that lets you drop dash immediately when hitting the ground after stomping.
Default: False

Elements.Name: StompDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Islands Only

Elements.Name: StompDashInputType
Description: The method of input used to perform a Stomp Dash on the islands.
Default: Hold

Elements.Name: StompDashInputTypeCyber
Description: The method of input used to perform a Stomp Dash in Cyber Space.
Default: Press

Elements.Name: StompDashHoldDelay
Description: The amount of seconds that need to pass when using the "Hold" input type before Sonic performs a drop dash when landing from a stomp.
Default: 0.125

Elements.Name: StompDashInitialVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of the Stomp Dash in 3D areas.
Default: 50.0

Elements.Name: StompDashInitialVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of the Stomp Dash in 2D areas.
Default: 25.0

Elements.Name: IsQuickStompDash
Description:
Uses the Quick Stomp Dash that lets you drop dash in the air by initiating a stomp past the specified velocity threshold.
Input Guide;
- Default: A + B (when moving faster than the specified velocity threshold)
- Require Air Boost: A + RT + B
Default: False

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Islands Only

Elements.Name: IsQuickStompDashRequireAirBoost
Description:
Require air boost to perform a Quick Stomp Dash.
This will ignore the velocity threshold.
Default: True

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashUncurlType
Description: The behaviour of the drop dash rolling when initiating it from the Quick Stomp Dash.
Default: None

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashVelocityThreshold
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to drop dash in the air in 3D areas.
Set this to zero to drop dash regardless of velocity.
Default: 25.0

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashVelocityThresholdSV
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to drop dash in the air in 2D areas.
Set this to zero to drop dash regardless of velocity.
Default: 15.0

Elements.Name: IsEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description:
Use physics parameters that allow you to move when drop dashing.
These are identical to the parameters used by "Tighter Drop Dash Rotation" and will not conflict with other physics mods or codes.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description:
Use physics parameters that allow you to move when drop dashing.
These are identical to the parameters used by "Tighter Drop Dash Rotation" and will not conflict with other physics mods or codes.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsNoCameraDelay
Description: Disables the Drop Dash camera delay when performing it normally.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsNoSlideDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the Slide Dash camera delay.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsNoAirDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the Air Dash camera delay.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsNoStompDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the Stomp Dash camera delay.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsNoQuickStompDashCameraDelay
Elements.DisplayName: Disable Quick Stomp Dash Camera Delay
Description: Disables the Quick Stomp Dash camera delay.
Default: False
Allows you to roll until the drop dash runs out.
Immediately uncurls when entering the state. This is useful if you have the Air Trick skill unlocked.
This will revert to None in Cyber Space.
Uncurls when becoming grounded.
Initiate a drop dash when landing whilst holding the B button (replacing stomp bounce).
Initiate a drop dash immediately when landing if the B button is not held.
Allow this move to function both on islands and in Cyber Space.
Allow this move to function only in Cyber Space.
Allow this move to function only on islands.
